bibl.title: Faces of Hellenism. Studies in the History of the Eastern Mediterranean (4th Century B.C. - 5th Century A.D.)

bibl.seg: VANDORPE Katelijn and Sofie WAEBENS, Why Tax Receipts on Wood? On Wooden Tablet Archives from Ptolemaic Egypt (Pathyris).

Peter VAN NUFFELEN (Ed.), Faces of Hellenism. Studies in the History of the Eastern Mediterranean (4th Century B.C. - 5th Century A.D.) = Studia Hellenistica. 48 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., 2009) pp. 179-197, 2 tabl., 3 graphiques.

Introduction. - Wood as writing material in Egypt. - Wooden tablets in Ptolemaic Upper Egypt (Pathyris). - Individual preference for wood. - Pp. 189-197: Appendix. Survey of the wooden tablet archives.
